org.zaproxy.zap.spider
Class SpiderParam

java.lang.Object
  org.parosproxy.paros.common.AbstractParam
      org.zaproxy.zap.spider.SpiderParam

public class SpiderParam
extends AbstractParam

The SpiderParam wraps all the parameters that are given to the spider.

isPostForm

public boolean isPostForm()
Checks if is the forms should be submitted with the HTTP POST method. This option should not be used if the forms are not processed at all (processForm).

Returns:
true, if the forms should be posted.

setPostForm

public void setPostForm(boolean postForm)
Sets if the forms should be submitted with the HTTP POST method. This option should not be used if the forms are not processed at all (processForm).

Parameters:
postForm - the new post form status

setSkipURLString

public void setSkipURLString(java.lang.String skipURL)
Sets the skip url string. This string is being parsed into a pattern which is used to check if a url should be skipped while crawling.

Parameters:
skipURL - the new skip url string
